Given that there are no specific material property values mentioned in the text, it is not possible to provide you with the requested information. However, I can tell you that the concept of "Hole Mobility" is related to the properties of semiconductor materials. Hole mobility is a measure of how quickly an electric field can move holes (positive charges) through a semiconductor material. It is an important property for the design and optimization of semiconductor devices, such as transistors and solar cells.
